mapper.sql: t_house_user_tag_relate.id , t_house_user_tag_relate.tag_id AS tagId, t_house_user_tag_relate.user_id AS userId, t_house_user_tag_relate.sales_id AS salesId, t_house_user_tag_relate.create_time AS createTime, t_house_user_tag_relate.update_time AS updateTime, t_house_user_tag.tag_name AS tagName
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_user_tag_relate.*,t_house_user_tag.tag_name AS tagName FROM t_house_user_tag_relate JOIN t_house_user_tag on t_house_user_tag.id = t_house_user_tag_relate.tag_id WHERE t_house_user_tag_relate.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_user_tag_relate.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_user_tag_relate JOIN t_house_user_tag on t_house_user_tag.id = t_house_user_tag_relate.tag_id
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_user_tag_relate.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_user_tag_relate.tag_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.tagId},'%')
AND t_house_user_tag_relate.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_user_tag_relate.sales_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.salesId},'%')
AND t_house_user_tag_relate.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_user_tag_relate.update_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.updateTime},'%')
AND t_house_user_tag_relate.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_user_tag_relate.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
ORDER BY t_house_user_tag_relate.update_time DESC , t_house_user_tag_relate.create_time DESC
